oojsplus-color-picker-color-blue: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-red: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-green: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-yellow: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-orangered: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-olive: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-pink: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-clear-label: Label of a button that removes a color selection
oojsplus-color-picker-label: Default label of a color-picker widget
oojsplus-data-delete-row-prompt: Prompt text before user deletes a row in a grid
oojsplus-data-paginator-page-total-count:
Label for the total number of rows in a grid data source. 
 $1 = Number of rows
oojsplus-data-tree-new-root-item-label: Tree label for button that inserts new root node
oojsplus-data-tree-item-remove-label:
Tree label for the button in item options that removed the selected node
{{Identical|Remove}}
oojsplus-data-tree-item-add-label: Tree label for the button in item options that adds new subnode to the selected node
oojsplus-stepprogressbar-default-final-l: Default label for the last step in StepProgressBar widget
